recognition.name: Outstanding Performer
recognition.desc: Have been rated outstanding performer for 2 consecutive financial years. Appreciated by Clients, Managers and Peers.

aboutme.content: Hi, I'm Ashish Dwivedi. I hail from New Delhi. I'm a Web Developer and currently working in Infosys Limited with an experience of 2 years. I have specialized skillset in Front End development with the knowledge of leading front end technologies like AngularJS, jQuery, Bootstrap etc. I'm very keen on learning new technologies and have a tendency to prioritize my work over everything else. Leave me a message if you would like to know more about me.
